alert.note: Alert for St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued December 25 at 1:22PM EST until December 25 at 5:45PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... An Ice Jam in... Central St. Lawrence County in northern New York... * Until 545 PM EST. * At 122 PM EST, emergency management reported an ice jam on the Raquette River in the town of Pierrepont with numerous homes being evacuated near Alexander Drive. Per emergency management, water is still rising rapidly with rises over a foot in the past 30 minutes. HAZARD...Flash flooding from an ice jam. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Flooding of areas near the ice jam. * An ice jam has developed on the Raquette River in the town of Pierrepont with numerous homes being evacuated near Alexander Drive. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED
info.instruction: Ice jams are unpredictable, and rapid fluctuations in water levels are possible. Please obey all road closures and instructions from local authorities. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
